body:
> How is this different from CreateLocalFilename? (I mean, I can tell from reading the code, but not really from reading the header.)

Changed name to `CreateLocalFilename`.

> Maybe what you actually want to do is add an optional suffix param to CreateLocalFilename?

You mean `bool CreateTempFilename(string* prefix, const string& suffix = "")`?

> Or even just call CreateLocalFilename inside of hlo_graph_dumper and just append the suffix to the returned filename?

Then we will have to check if the new filename actually exists after appending suffix, repeating the work of `CreateLocalFilename`.
body_html:
How is this different from CreateLocalFilename? (I mean, I can tell from reading the code, but not really from reading the header.)

Changed name to CreateLocalFilename.

Maybe what you actually want to do is add an optional suffix param to CreateLocalFilename?

You mean bool CreateTempFilename(string* prefix, const string& suffix = "")?

Or even just call CreateLocalFilename inside of hlo_graph_dumper and just append the suffix to the returned filename?

Then we will have to check if the new filename actually exists after appending suffix, repeating the work of CreateLocalFilename.
body_text:
How is this different from CreateLocalFilename? (I mean, I can tell from reading the code, but not really from reading the header.)

Changed name to CreateLocalFilename.

Maybe what you actually want to do is add an optional suffix param to CreateLocalFilename?

You mean bool CreateTempFilename(string* prefix, const string& suffix = "")?

Or even just call CreateLocalFilename inside of hlo_graph_dumper and just append the suffix to the returned filename?

Then we will have to check if the new filename actually exists after appending suffix, repeating the work of CreateLocalFilename.
